headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Vapid Slamtruck
content:
So, it’s a portable ramp? No. It’s not. It’s a very professional dedicated vehicle hauler.

Due to a recent spate of accidents involving this model, Vapid wants to remind any potential buyers that a common side effect of driving the Slamtruck is the constant stream of stunters attempting to clear your ramp on the freeway.

See one coming? For the love of god, duck.
